article.title: Internships-Program Operations
article.summary: Learn about the duties and responsibilities of the Trade Agreements Compliance Program Operations Internships.
article.content:
Internships-Program Operations

  • Assist staff in analyzing database content to report on trends in trade barriers
  • Assist staff in reviewing unclassified cables for compliance issues
  • Assist staff in analyzing the National Trade Estimate (NTE) Report
  • Assist staff in drafting or evaluating public relations, success stories, briefing, training, or outreach materials, testimonies, speeches, and other public statements by the Administration
  • Assist staff in redesigning the content and format of the Office of Trade Agreements Negotiations and Compliance website
  • Assist staff in adapting public relations and other messaging material for target audiences in multiple media in support of the Program
  • Assist staff in maintaining case success chart and ensure that it is current
  • Assist with outreach and training activities and events
  • Assist in work with private sector Compliance Liaisons, updating contact lists and obtaining or responding to trade barrier complaints from member companies
  • Devise tracking tools and metrics for global outreach and training activities
  • Produce performance measure reports for senior managers on compliance activities
  • Assist in database entry and maintenance

Back to Internships Main
